# Steamcreate2
## **This beta modpack currently has no storyline.**

[![g](https://wsrv.nl/?url=https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@intergrav/devins-badges@3/assets/cozy/available/github_vector.svg&n=-1)](https://github.com/Dseelis/Steamcreate2)[![c](https://wsrv.nl/?url=https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@intergrav/devins-badges@3/assets/cozy/available/curseforge_vector.svg&n=-1)](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/modpacks/steamcreate2)

 

**![](https://media.forgecdn.net/attachments/description/1368897/description_308c3900-0000-439f-99ba-9648a93ffc18.png)**

<p style="text-align: center;">**A world trapped between reality and illusion.**  
**Time folds upon itself, dimensions blur, and every action echoes twice.**</p>

![](https://media.forgecdn.net/attachments/description/1368897/description_e45da186-ce04-486b-8576-4abc50313f97.png)

<p style="text-align: center;">**In Steamcreate2, nothing is as it seems. The world exists in a fragile balance between creation and decay between logic and chaos. Magic seeps through cracks in reality, and technology strives to hold the world together, but the cycle always repeats**</p>

**![](https://media.forgecdn.net/attachments/description/1368897/description_0f6de4df-3f89-459c-b8e5-891c14536672.png)**

<p style="text-align: center;">**Some paths lead to salvation, others to ruin, but all are part of the same endless paradox. Explore forgotten ruins, uncover ancient mechanisms, and discover the truth hidden within the loop**</p>

**![](https://media.forgecdn.net/attachments/description/1368897/description_bf70d41f-5613-4148-a359-702579092ecb.png)**

<p style="text-align: center;">**You are not the first to walk this path  and you may not be the last**</p>

![](https://media.forgecdn.net/attachments/description/1368897/description_aadc0d0a-6081-43b1-bf6f-5f32f4b0ced1.png)
